page.title: 14A TYPICAL DAY
page.content: A TYPICAL DAY. I GET DRESSED, HAVE ALL-BRAN AND TOAST AND HONEY FOR BREAKFAST,THEN I CLEAN MY TEETH AND MAKE MY BED. NEXT I PRACTISE ON MY VIOLIN, GET MY PACKED LUNCH AND GO TO SCHOOL. WE START WITH HYMNS,PRAYERS AND A STORY,SOMETIMES WE DO OUR OWN ASSEMBLY.AFTER THAT WE DO LESSONS-MATHS,ENGLISH,READING AND WRITING.SOMETIMES WE WATCH TELEVISION. THEN WE HAVE LUNCH,SOME HAVE A COOKED MEAL.AFTER I MIGHT HAVE A DESCANT OR RECORDER LESSON. IN THE AFTERNOON WE DO OTHER THINGS. I LIKE SCIENCE,ART AND DRAMA. WHEN WE COME OUT OF SCHOOL. I SEE IF MY FRIEND IS PLAYING, AND THEN I HAVE TEA. AT 8.00PM.I GET INTO BED AND MUMMY AND DADDY KISS ME GOOD-NIGHT.
